subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which emperor established the city of Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर के स्थापना किस सरकारवाले की कलांकन थी।
D_hi: सम्राट महाराज स्वामितराज सावाई जय सिंग
explanation_en: The correct answer is Maharaja Jai Singh II, better known as Samrat Maharaja Jai Singh. He established Jaipur, also known as Pink City, as the capital of his kingdom.
explanation_hi: सचिव महाराज जय सिंग बेल्सी सावाई जय सिंग थीं सम्राट महाराज, ज्वामितराज सावाई जय सिंग

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which tribe was the most prominent among the Rajput tribes in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: The Meenas tribe was the most prominent among the Rajput tribes in Rajasthan. They were known for their bravery, warrior skills, and strong social structure.
explanation_hi: राजभावन मेणा और राजपूतों के सामान्य ऊंग बींग

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king established the city of Jaipur?
explanation_en: Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II is the king who established Jaipur. He was a great architect and laid the foundation of Jaipur in 1727 AD.
explanation_hi: Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II महाराज सावाई जय सिंग II के लिएसी विशेष
question_en: Who was the founder of Udaipur?
explanation_en: Maharana Bhim Singh II was the founder of Udaipur, which is now known as Udaipur. He established the city during the 15th century and is widely regarded as a patron of art and culture.
